analyzed: mkhur bkang rnam pa bzhi yin te //

analyzed: snum dang zhi byed spyod rma 'tshob //

analyzed: de las gsum ni rlung la sogs //

original: gsum gtang tha ma rma la phan //
analyzed: gsum gtang tha ma rma la phan //

analyzed: 'dir sman mngar skyur lan tshva dang // tsha dang snum ni bskol ba yin //

analyzed: de la snum dang 'o ma dang // sbrang rtsi chu dang tsha dang chang //
translated: Oil, milk, honey, water, salt, and alcohol,🔽and

analyzed: ba gcin 'bru yi khu ba rnams // sman ni ji lta ji lta dang // lde gur bcas pa bskol ba ni //

original: ji tsam bzod pa rnam par sbyar //
analyzed: ji tsam bzod pa rnam par sbyar //

analyzed: ti la chus mkhur ba bkang pa phan /

analyzed: rtag tu mkhur ba bkang ste gzhag / til mar dag gam sha khu bsngags //

analyzed: kha drod che tsha chos pa dang // 'phral du rma ni byung ba dang // dug @91a * //

analyzed: sbrang rtsi mkhur bkang byas pas ni // kha yi dri ma sbyong byed cing //

analyzed: kha yi rma ni 'tshob byed yin // kha tsha skom dad rab zhi byed //

original: ro mi tshor dang dri ma che //
analyzed: ro mi tshor dang dri ma che //

original: kha mnam 'bras rtsa bas bkang bas sel /
analyzed: kha mnam 'bras rtsa bas bkang bas sel /

analyzed: de nyid cung zad tsha bcas bsil //

original: kha skams sel ba'i dam pa yin //
analyzed: kha skams sel ba'i dam pa yin //

original: thal sman rnon khus mkhur bkang bas //
analyzed: thal sman rnon khus mkhur bkang bas //

original: bad kan sogs pa myur du sel //
analyzed: bad kan sogs pa myur du sel //

analyzed: chu tshan dro 'jam mkhur bkang bas //

original: kha ni yang zhing bde bar byed //
analyzed: kha ni yang zhing bde bar byed //

analyzed: rlung med nyi tshan bcas par ni // phrag pa ma jing bar dugs bya mnye //

original: mkhur ba bkang nas gdong ba ni //
analyzed: mkhur ba bkang nas gdong ba ni //

original: cung zad bteg ste ji srid na //
analyzed: cung zad bteg ste ji srid na //

analyzed: khar brngubs pa yis khyad par gso ba ni //

analyzed: mig sman blugs pa rab tsha rnos //

analyzed: bzang po gsal bar byed pa ni //

analyzed: gser dang dngul las byas pa bsngags //

original: shin tu rno ba'i lcags las bya //
analyzed: shin tu rno ba'i lcags las bya //

original: rtse mo shin tu legs brdungs la //
analyzed: rtse mo shin tu legs brdungs la //

original: autpala sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba'i //
analyzed: autpala sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba'i //

original: rang ming rjes mthun gzugs can ni //
analyzed: rang ming rjes mthun gzugs can ni //

original: rtag tu nye bar gzhag par bya //🔽rtse mo re re dag la yang //
analyzed: rtag tu nye bar gzhag par bya // rtse mo re re dag la yang //

original: rang tshod sor phyed gnyis dang bzhi //
analyzed: rang tshod sor phyed gnyis dang bzhi //

analyzed: phal cher gnyis dang gsum du bya //

original: de gnas khyad par dag la sbyar //
analyzed: de gnas khyad par dag la sbyar //

original: de las dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i rtse //
analyzed: de las dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i rtse //

analyzed: mdzub sen nang gi dbyibs 'drar bya //

original: de ni rnyil skyes lkog ma yi //
analyzed: de ni rnyil skyes lkog ma yi //

analyzed: ltag pa ring zhing rtse gug pa //

analyzed: so thung nad tshul ji bzhin sbyar //

original: autpa la dang so phyed kyis //
analyzed: autpa la dang so phyed kyis //

analyzed: sna yi thor bu dpyad la sbyar //

analyzed: rma tshol 'jam po rta bla ba'i //

analyzed: mgo bo 'dra gzhal brtag par bya //

analyzed: de las gzhan pa khab rtse 'dra //

analyzed: rtse bu ga can ni dbug la sbyar ;

analyzed: / ljang ba'i lo 'dra 'bigs pa la //

original: tog kha 'bus 'dra //
analyzed: tog kha 'bus 'dra //

original: @96b lcags min gtar spyad phra mo ste //
analyzed: @96b lcags min gtar spyad phra mo ste //

analyzed: de yang de bzhin sbyar bar bya //

analyzed: mkho ba nad kyi dmigs dang sbyar //

analyzed: 'dren dang 'byin dang 'bral dang 'drub //

analyzed: gcad dang dral dang phyi ba'i phyir //

original: spyad kyi gtsags 'bras rtsa ba'i bar //
analyzed: spyad kyi gtsags 'bras rtsa ba'i bar //
translated: the tools are the lancing needle, the root,

original: mdzub mo gung mo mtheb mo yis //
analyzed: mdzub mo gung mo mtheb mo yis //

original: ma yengs pa dang legs par gzung //
analyzed: ma yengs pa dang legs par gzung //

original: gtar ga gdab phyir rtse mo'i drung //
analyzed: gtar ga gdab phyir rtse mo'i drung //

original: mdzub mo dang ni mthe bos gzung /
analyzed: mdzub mo dang ni mthe bos gzung /

original: 'bras 'dra ba yi yu ba ni ;🔽/ chang bar bcug ste rtse mas gdab //
analyzed: 'bras 'dra ba yi yu ba ni ; / chang bar bcug ste rtse mas gdab //
translated: Insert the handle of the needle, which is shaped like a grain,🔽into the mouth of the horn, and pierce with the tip.

original: dbyung don yu ba nas gzung bya //
analyzed: dbyung don yu ba nas gzung bya //

original: gzhan dag bya ba gang bder bya //
analyzed: gzhan dag bya ba gang bder bya //

analyzed: gtar spyad sna tshogs dag gi snod // gso ras bal snam men dri'am //

original: pags 'jam du gu la las byas //
analyzed: pags 'jam du gu la las byas //
translated: or of soft leather, or of iguana skin.

original: rab tu stug pa zheng sor dgu //
analyzed: rab tu stug pa zheng sor dgu //

original: srid du sar ni bcu gnyis pa ;🔽bal gyis bar bcad spyad bcug la //
analyzed: srid du sar ni bcu gnyis pa ; bal gyis bar bcad spyad bcug la //

analyzed: legs par gzhag ste drub pa dang // thur mas kha ni brgyu bar bya // srin bu pad pa bder gnas pa //

original: khrag dbyung phyir na sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: khrag dbyung phyir na sbyar bar bya //
translated: To remove blood, use a leech.🔽They come from the smell of fish, frogs, and so on, in water,

original: chu nang nya dang sbal stsogs dang // mi ro'i dri ma mnam las byung //
analyzed: chu nang nya dang sbal stsogs dang // mi ro'i dri ma mnam las byung //

original: dmar dang dkar dang shin tu gnag / mi srun sbom dang 'byil ba dang // 'ja' tshon dang 'dra ro stod bkra //
analyzed: dmar dang dkar dang shin tu gnag / mi srun sbom dang 'byil ba dang // 'ja' tshon dang 'dra ro stod bkra //

original: spu yod de rnams dug can yin //
analyzed: spu yod de rnams dug can yin //

original: spang bya des ni khrag gzhibs na //
analyzed: spang bya des ni khrag gzhibs na //

original: g-ya' rnags 'dzag rims mgo 'khor skyed //
analyzed: g-ya' rnags 'dzag rims mgo 'khor skyed //

original: de la dugs khrag mkhris gso bya //
analyzed: de la dugs khrag mkhris gso bya //

analyzed: chu mdog rnam par gsal ba dang // dug med nya lcibs med las byung //
translated: and it comes from a place without poison or snail shells.

original: rtsa snar ro stong sngo khra zlum //
analyzed: rtsa snar ro stong sngo khra zlum //
translated: The veins are round, with a mottled blue upper part,

original: rgyab ni dur smrig 'dra lus phra //
analyzed: rgyab ni dur smrig 'dra lus phra //

original: lto ni cung zad ser ba bzang //
analyzed: lto ni cung zad ser ba bzang //

original: de yang legs par ma skyugs dang // rtag tu 'thung du bcug pa dag / chu nang zhugs te nub pa ni //
analyzed: de yang legs par ma skyugs dang // rtag tu 'thung du bcug pa dag / chu nang zhugs te nub pa ni //

original: khrag gis myos pa yin pas spangs //
analyzed: khrag gis myos pa yin pas spangs //
translated: Since it is intoxicated with blood, it should be avoided.🔽Then, the other should be examined:🔽put it in water mixed with urine,🔽put it in a kanjī or silk,

analyzed: de nas cig shos skye rab brtags / chu sbyar ba yi nang du gzhug / kan dzi'am dar ba'i nang du gzhug / slar yang chur ni dbugs phyung nas //

original: mar rams sa zhag nu zhom //
analyzed: mar rams sa zhag nu zhom //
translated: Marrow, fat, breast milk, and blood

analyzed: khrag gi thig pa bskus 'thung gzhug /'thungs tshe ro stod mthor gyur na //

analyzed: ras ma srab mos g-yogs par bya / khrag @97a * //
translated: It is covered with a thin cloth.

original: ni bzang ngan 'dres pa las //
analyzed: ni bzang ngan 'dres pa las //

original: pad pa dang por nad khrag ni //
analyzed: pad pa dang por nad khrag ni //
translated: First, the blood of the disease

analyzed: 'thungs te ngang pas 'o ma dang // 'dres chu'i 'o ma len dang mtshungs //
translated: is drunk, like a swan taking milk from water mixed with milk.

original: so yis 'debs pa'am g-ya' gyur na //
analyzed: so yis 'debs pa'am g-ya' gyur na //

analyzed: de ni slar dbyung skyug tu gzhug // rgyam tsha til mar gyis kha bsku //
translated: it should be removed and vomiting induced.🔽It is coated with Gyam tsha and sesame oil.

original: phye ma 'jam pos rgyab tu gtor ;
analyzed: phye ma 'jam pos rgyab tu gtor ;
translated: It is sprinkled on the back with fine powder.

original: / slar yang zhag bdun bar du ni //
analyzed: / slar yang zhag bdun bar du ni //
translated: Again, for seven days,

original: khrag myos bsrungs la 'thung mi gzhug / srin bu pad pa legs skyugs na //
analyzed: khrag myos bsrungs la 'thung mi gzhug / srin bu pad pa legs skyugs na //
translated: blood should be protected from intoxication and not drunk. If the worm is well vomited,

analyzed: kha chu rul bag sbyang phyir bya //

analyzed: ye'us byugs la sman bsil bsku //

analyzed: nad kyi khrag dang bral gyur na ;

analyzed: /'phral du rtsa dmar nad med 'gyur //

original: ma dag gnas nas bskyod gyur pa //
analyzed: ma dag gnas nas bskyod gyur pa //

analyzed: rma yi gnas su 'dug pa'i khrag / zhag lon na ni gnag par 'gyur //

analyzed: de bas de ni slar dbyung ngo //

original: mkhris rgyas khrag gi nad la ni //
analyzed: mkhris rgyas khrag gi nad la ni //

analyzed: ku ba bum pa sbyar mi bya //

analyzed: de gnyis me dang bcas pa yin //

original: rlung dang bad kan la sbyar bya //
analyzed: rlung dang bad kan la sbyar bya //

original: bad kan las gyur nad khrag ni //
analyzed: bad kan las gyur nad khrag ni //

analyzed: ska bas rngabs rus gzhib mi bya //

analyzed: rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur khrag / rngabs rvas gzhibs te dbyung bar bya // lus kyi gong du srad bu'am //

original: ras kyi dam du bcings nas ni //🔽chu ba tshis rus gnad rnams ni //
analyzed: ras kyi dam du bcings nas ni // chu ba tshis rus gnad rnams ni //

original: dor te zhal zhal gdab bar bya //
analyzed: dor te zhal zhal gdab bar bya //

original: gyen du dbyung ba'i thabs kyis ni //
analyzed: gyen du dbyung ba'i thabs kyis ni //

original: thur du babs pa gdab bar bya //
analyzed: thur du babs pa gdab bar bya //

analyzed: zab dang nye dang 'phred mi gdab //

analyzed: btab ba'i gnas su'ang gdab mi bya //

analyzed: zhal zhal bya ba phyogs gcig 'dus //

analyzed: rtsa mdud srin bus khrag 'byung zhing // bem bem por gyur rva stsogs gdab ; / nad khrag lus khyab gtar ga gdab //

original: khrag nad 'dus pa zhal zhal bya //
analyzed: khrag nad 'dus pa zhal zhal bya //

original: gting na yod pa pad pas dbyung //
analyzed: gting na yod pa pad pas dbyung //

original: pags gnas ku bum rdabs ras dbyung //
analyzed: pags gnas ku bum rdabs ras dbyung //

original: lus khyab khrag la gtar gnyid //
analyzed: lus khyab khrag la gtar gnyid //

analyzed: rlung stsogs gnas la rngabs rva dang // pad pa ku bas rim bzhin dbyung //

original: khrag phyung @97b bsil bskus la stsogs pas //
analyzed: khrag phyung @97b bsil bskus la stsogs pas //

original: rlung ni rnam par 'khrugs gyur te //
analyzed: rlung ni rnam par 'khrugs gyur te //

original: rma na g-ya' zhing skrangs gyur na'ang //
analyzed: rma na g-ya' zhing skrangs gyur na'ang //

original: de la zhun mar dron pos bsku //
analyzed: de la zhun mar dron pos bsku //

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /

original: mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o /
analyzed: mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o /

original: // / de nas gtar ga gdab pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: // / de nas gtar ga gdab pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o //

original: cung zad mngar zhing tsha bro la //
analyzed: cung zad mngar zhing tsha bro la //

original: grang dang tsha min ska ba min //
analyzed: grang dang tsha min ska ba min //

analyzed: padma lam bu chu gsher dang // btsod dang ri bong khrag ltar dmar //

analyzed: dag cing dmar ba 'byung ba ni //

analyzed: de nyid kyis ni lus gnas byed //

analyzed: de ni phal cher bad mkhris kyi // nad kyis 'khrugs pas gnod bskyad pas //

analyzed: me dpal 'bras dang mcher nad dang // skran dang me drod bri dang rims //

analyzed: bsil dro snum dang rtsub stsogs kyis //

analyzed: nad gang gsos par gyur pa dag / legs par 'chos par ma gyur pa // de ni khrag 'khrugs las gyur yin //

analyzed: khrag bdo gyur pa de las ni //

original: gtar ga gdab pas dbyung bar bya //
analyzed: gtar ga gdab pas dbyung bar bya //

analyzed: rlung gi nad kyis nyen pa dang / sbrum ma bu btsas zas ma zhu //

analyzed: tshad 'khru rims dang skyugs pa dang // skya rbab yan lag kun skrangs dang // snum 'thungs pa la sbyor ba dang // de bzhin las lnga byas la min //

analyzed: yon po'am mi snang la mi gdab //

analyzed: tshabs chen nad ni ma gtogs pa //

analyzed: grang la tsha char rlung dus min //

original: mgo dang mig gi nad rnams la //
analyzed: mgo dang mig gi nad rnams la //

analyzed: sna yi nad la sna rtser ro //

analyzed: mchu dang rkan gyi rtsar gdab bo // nam tshong yan chad rtsa mdud mgul // rna ba mur 'gram spyir gnas gdab //

original: mtshams su gdab //
analyzed: mtshams su gdab //

original: yang na kun la smin mtshams gdab //
analyzed: yang na kun la smin mtshams gdab //

original: 'bras dang rtsib logs zug pa la //
analyzed: 'bras dang rtsib logs zug pa la //

analyzed: rtsib logs nu ma'i bar rtsa gdab //

analyzed: mjug to'i gong ma sor gnyis par // khu ba'i mtshan nad pho mtshan rtsa //

analyzed: lkog ma'i wa bar brla rtsa gdab //

analyzed: gzugs 'khums pus mthil 'og gam ni //

analyzed: rkub tshos bus mo'i lha pa'i steng ; / nad la long mo'i ltag sor bzhir //

analyzed: rkang tsha 'theng dang sbrid pa dang // rting rdol rlung nad mdzer ba dang // rkang sor snags su chad pa la // rgya tshigs las gong sor gnyis gdab //
translated: In the back of the ankle, four fingerbreadths above, in the case of lameness, limping, numbness, a split heel, a wind disease, a cramp,🔽or a fracture of the toes.

original: 'khums la rkang 'khums lta bur gdab //
analyzed: 'khums la rkang 'khums lta bur gdab //

original: ji skad bshad pa ma mngon na //🔽gnad ma gtogs pa gar nye ba'i //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa ma mngon na // gnad ma gtogs pa gar nye ba'i //
translated: If the above are not apparent,🔽pierce elsewhere, in the direction of the disease,

original: phyogs gzhan dag tu gtar ga gdab //
analyzed: phyogs gzhan dag tu gtar ga gdab //
translated: except for the vital points.

original: de nas lus snum gtar ga yi //
analyzed: de nas lus snum gtar ga yi //
translated: Then, for the body, apply an oil massage,

original: yo byad kun bsags stobs dang ldan //
analyzed: yo byad kun bsags stobs dang ldan //

original: bkra shis byas shing kha zas ni //
analyzed: bkra shis byas shing kha zas ni //

analyzed: snum zos khu ba 'thungs ba dang // me dang nyi mtshan gyis dugs byas //
translated: with fire and the sun.🔽He sits on a high seat, his hair is tied with a soft cloth,

analyzed: bus mnyam mtho ba'i stan la 'dug / skra rtsa ras ni 'jam pos bcings // pus mo'i lha ngar gru mo btsugs //

original: khu tshur nang du glod bcug pas //
analyzed: khu tshur nang du glod bcug pas //

original: mgul pa dam du btsir bar bya //
analyzed: mgul pa dam du btsir bar bya //

analyzed: so bsdam lud pa lu ba dang // mkhur ba gnyis ni bud par bya //

analyzed: de la rgyab nas btsir ba dang // gos kyis dkri zhing mdzub mo ni //

analyzed: g-yon pa lkog mar bcug nas su //

analyzed: ma gtogs bsdam pa'i cho ga yin //

original: de 'og sman pa'i mthe bo las //🔽gung mo btang bar gyur ba yis //
analyzed: de 'og sman pa'i mthe bo las // gung mo btang bar gyur ba yis //

analyzed: rtsa byung mngon la gdab byas nas //

original: reg pa'am mthe bos mnan byas la //
analyzed: reg pa'am mthe bos mnan byas la //
translated: and the patient is made to touch or press with the thumb.

original: lag pa g-yon pas bzung ba yi //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pas bzung ba yi //

original: de bzhin gdab pa'am btsir ba yis //
analyzed: de bzhin gdab pa'am btsir ba yis //

analyzed: bem rtol gdab las khrag dbyung ngo // sna drung gi ni rtsar @98b gdab pa //

original: rtse mo mthe bos bteg nas ni //
analyzed: rtse mo mthe bos bteg nas ni //

original: gtsags rtse 'bras 'dra gdab bar bya //
analyzed: gtsags rtse 'bras 'dra gdab bar bya //

original: lce bteg bzlog ste sos mnan la //
analyzed: lce bteg bzlog ste sos mnan la //

original: lce 'og rtsar ni gdab bar bya //
analyzed: lce 'og rtsar ni gdab bar bya //
translated: one should stab the channel under the tongue.

original: nu ma yan chad bsdams nas ni //
analyzed: nu ma yan chad bsdams nas ni //

original: mgul par gnas pa'i rtsar gdab bo //
analyzed: mgul par gnas pa'i rtsar gdab bo //
translated: one should stab the channel located in the throat.

original: lag pa gnyis su rdo bcangs te //🔽lag pa pus mor brten te brkyang //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis su rdo bcangs te // lag pa pus mor brten te brkyang //

analyzed: mchan khung man chad mnyes nas na //

original: gong du bcings la mdo rtsar gdab //
analyzed: gong du bcings la mdo rtsar gdab //

analyzed: lag ngar rtsa ni bder 'dug ste //

original: gdab pa'i sor bzhi gong gi ni //
analyzed: gdab pa'i sor bzhi gong gi ni //

original: phyogs su ras kyis dam bcings la //
analyzed: phyogs su ras kyis dam bcings la //

original: mthe bo chang par bcug nas ni //
analyzed: mthe bo chang par bcug nas ni //

original: lag ngar brkyang la gdab par bya //
analyzed: lag ngar brkyang la gdab par bya //

original: rtsib logs rtsa ni dpung pa gnyis //
analyzed: rtsib logs rtsa ni dpung pa gnyis //
translated: The ribs and the vessels of the ribs are in the two shoulders.

original: thur du dpyangs te gdab bar bya //🔽pho mtshan rtsa ni bteg gdab //
analyzed: thur du dpyangs te gdab bar bya // pho mtshan rtsa ni bteg gdab //

analyzed: gnad zug logs shig ma bshad de //

original: de rnams sha stsogs la gnas yin //
analyzed: de rnams sha stsogs la gnas yin //
translated: Because they are located in the flesh and so on.

original: spyir ni zug rdu bcas bskyod pa'i //
analyzed: spyir ni zug rdu bcas bskyod pa'i //
translated: In general, the pain with movement

original: bya bas nad bcas las shes bya //
analyzed: bya bas nad bcas las shes bya //
translated: The nature of the object to be removed should be understood from the symptoms.🔽In brief, the shape of the wound is round, split,

analyzed: mi mngon rnam par shes par bya //

analyzed: de rnams dbyung ba'i thabs gyur gnyis //

analyzed: rtse nas drang dang rtsa nas drang //

original: de las bzlog pas dbyung bar bya //
analyzed: de las bzlog pas dbyung bar bya //

original: dbyung sla gang na yod dral te //
analyzed: dbyung sla gang na yod dral te //
translated: Where it is easy to remove, open it up

original: de nas thad kar drang bar bya //
analyzed: de nas thad kar drang bar bya //

analyzed: mtshon ni brang dang mtshan khung dang // brla drung rtsib logs zug pa dang // mdun drang rtse mo mngon gcad bya //
translated: thigh, or side should be pulled out straight.🔽Do not pull out a weapon that is not stuck in,

analyzed: kha zheng che drang mi bya dang // zug rngur ma gyur mde'u dang // mi mngon gnod med pa mi dbyung //

analyzed: de nas lag pas zin gyur na //
translated: Then, when it is grasped by the hand,

original: lag pa gnyis kyis drang bar bya //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis kyis drang bar bya //

analyzed: gal te dbyung bar nus gyur pa //

analyzed: kang ka bring ka khrung khrung dang // bya rog sha ra bye'i mchus drang //

analyzed: pags stsogs la gnas skam pas drang //

original: khong stong nang nas nya mgos dbyung //
analyzed: khong stong nang nas nya mgos dbyung //

analyzed: sbu gur gnas pa 'dam bu 'dras //

analyzed: lhag ma gzhan gyis ci rigs drang //

analyzed: yang na dang po mtshon gyis dral //

analyzed: de nas rma yi khrag bsal ba //

analyzed: byas la mar gyis dugs bya zhing //

analyzed: bcings te spyod pa bsten par bya //

original: rtsa dang chu bar mtshon lus pa //
analyzed: rtsa dang chu bar mtshon lus pa //
translated: A vein or a duct that is not severed is

original: thur mas bskyod de dbyung bar bya //
analyzed: thur mas bskyod de dbyung bar bya //

original: snying gar gnas pa'i zug rngu ni //
analyzed: snying gar gnas pa'i zug rngu ni //

analyzed: chu grang gtor bas sdangs byas la //

analyzed: ci rigs par ni dbyung bar bya //

analyzed: rma yi sgo nas dbyung dka' ba //

original: rus par zug pa rkang pa ni //
analyzed: rus par zug pa rkang pa ni //

analyzed: gnyis kyis mnan la drang bar bya //

original: de ltar ma nus stobs che ba'i //
analyzed: de ltar ma nus stobs che ba'i //
translated: If that does not work, then the strong assistants

analyzed: yan lag lnga pa legs bsdams nas //

analyzed: rta ni lcag gis gzhus nas su //

analyzed: g-ya' dang skrang ba la sogs chung //

analyzed: rgyal pa yi ni chu lta bur //

analyzed: med de bad kan med mi skrang //

analyzed: khrag med dmar bar mi 'gyur te //

analyzed: de bas nad khrag dang bcas smin //

analyzed: gnyer ma 'jum zhing mdog gnag la //

translated: and those with ashes, poison, or fire should not be sutured.🔽Having removed the bones, blood, dried flesh,

original: btsem pa rus du ma khrag skam @103b dang ; / rtsa dang spu rnams bsal nas ni //
analyzed: btsem pa rus du ma khrag skam @103b dang ; / rtsa dang spu rnams bsal nas ni //
translated: veins, and hair from the sutured area,

original: sha chad dum bu 'phyang ba dang // rang gi gnas su glan pa dang // rus tshigs bcug cing khrag gzags la //
analyzed: sha chad dum bu 'phyang ba dang // rang gi gnas su glan pa dang // rus tshigs bcug cing khrag gzags la //
translated: The flesh is cut and hangs in pieces,🔽and the wound is turned back to its place,🔽the joints of the bones are put in, and blood flows out.

original: skung pa shing shun rgyus pas btsem //
analyzed: skung pa shing shun rgyus pas btsem //
translated: The wound is covered with bark, and the sinews are sewn together with thread.

original: srubs ni nye ba'am ring mi bya //
analyzed: srubs ni nye ba'am ring mi bya //
translated: The wound should not be made too tight or too loose.

original: blang ba che ba'am chung mi bya //
analyzed: blang ba che ba'am chung mi bya //
translated: It should not be made too high or too low.

original: de nas spro bsring byas nas mthar //
analyzed: de nas spro bsring byas nas mthar //
translated: Then, after the wound has been stretched,🔽the wound is anointed with honey and butter,🔽and with the smoke of ginger and barley,

original: rma ni sbrang rtsi mar sbyar dang // skyer pa zar ma'i dud pa dang // 'bras bu gsum dang sa la ki //
analyzed: rma ni sbrang rtsi mar sbyar dang // skyer pa zar ma'i dud pa dang // 'bras bu gsum dang sa la ki //
translated: and with the three fruits and salt.

original: seng phrom mngar dang snum bcas pas //
analyzed: seng phrom mngar dang snum bcas pas //
translated: It is anointed with sweet and oily sengphrom,

original: bskus la bcing stsogs sngon bzhin bya //
analyzed: bskus la bcing stsogs sngon bzhin bya //
translated: and bound and so forth as before.

original: rma kha khrag ni med 'gyur gang //
analyzed: rma kha khrag ni med 'gyur gang //
translated: If the wound is without blood,

original: de ni cung zad 'brud bya ste //
analyzed: de ni cung zad 'brud bya ste //
translated: it should be slightly opened.

original: rma 'byor byed pa khrag yin pas //
analyzed: rma 'byor byed pa khrag yin pas //
translated: Since blood is what heals wounds,

original: phyung ste legs par drub par bya //🔽de la bcings pa yul la stsogs //
analyzed: phyung ste legs par drub par bya // de la bcings pa yul la stsogs //
translated: it should be drawn out and well bandaged.🔽The binding and so forth should be applied

original: brtags nas nges par sbyar bar bya //🔽bal gos pags pa dar gsum dro //
analyzed: brtags nas nges par sbyar bar bya // bal gos pags pa dar gsum dro //
translated: after examining the place and so forth.🔽Wool, cotton, and leather are warm,

original: zar ma'i ras ni bsil ba yin //
analyzed: zar ma'i ras ni bsil ba yin //
translated: and barley cloth is cool.

original: dro grang rna pa shing bal 'dab //
analyzed: dro grang rna pa shing bal 'dab //
translated: The warm and cold compresses are cotton wool.

original: ras bal rgyus pa shing shun yin //
analyzed: ras bal rgyus pa shing shun yin //
translated: The cotton thread is the bark of the tree.

original: zangs lcags zha nye ro nye yis //🔽bad kan tshil ches rma la glan //
analyzed: zangs lcags zha nye ro nye yis // bad kan tshil ches rma la glan //
translated: The copper, iron, lead, and tin🔽are applied to the wounds of excessive phlegm and fat.

original: chag thur shing byang pags pa dang // shing shun smyig tshal stsogs pas bcings //
analyzed: chag thur shing byang pags pa dang // shing shun smyig tshal stsogs pas bcings //
translated: The fractures are bound with wood, bark, bamboo, and so forth.

original: dbyibs ni rang min rjes mthun pa'i //
analyzed: dbyibs ni rang min rjes mthun pa'i //
translated: The shape is not the original but is similar.

original: bcing ba bco lnga rnam bya ste //
analyzed: bcing ba bco lnga rnam bya ste //
translated: The fifteen types of binding are done.

original: shubs dang bkra shis lhod par bcing //
analyzed: shubs dang bkra shis lhod par bcing //
translated: The sheath, auspicious, loose binding,

original: mthar chags bcing dang zlum por bcing //
analyzed: mthar chags bcing dang zlum por bcing //
translated: continuous binding, round binding,🔽arrow, iron, throne, binding,🔽bag, canopy, necklace,

original: mda' lcags khri dang dam bcing dang // sgye'u bla re lkog shal dang // 'ur mthil zung glan zlum pa dang // yan lag lnga pa zhes bya sbyar //
analyzed: mda' lcags khri dang dam bcing dang // sgye'u bla re lkog shal dang // 'ur mthil zung glan zlum pa dang // yan lag lnga pa zhes bya sbyar //
translated: urthi, pair, round, and five-limbed—these are applied.

original: de las gang zhig gang legs sbyor //
analyzed: de las gang zhig gang legs sbyor //
translated: Whatever is best for which one,

original: de ni de ru legs par sbyar //
analyzed: de ni de ru legs par sbyar //
translated: that is well applied there.🔽The thighs, tail, armpits, and groin

original: brla dang mjug tsos mchan khung dang // chu so spyi bor dam du bcing //
analyzed: brla dang mjug tsos mchan khung dang // chu so spyi bor dam du bcing //
translated: are tightly bound at the top.

original: lag ngar gdong dang rna ba dang // rgyab dang rtsi ba logs mgul pa lto //
analyzed: lag ngar gdong dang rna ba dang // rgyab dang rtsi ba logs mgul pa lto //
translated: The arms, face, ears, back, sides, neck, and belly.

original: pho mtshan rlig pa ran par bcing //
analyzed: pho mtshan rlig pa ran par bcing //
translated: The penis and testicles are tightly bound.

original: mig dang tshigs su lhod par bcing //
analyzed: mig dang tshigs su lhod par bcing //
translated: The eyes and joints are loosely bound.

original: lhod bcings rma ni bad kan dang // rlung shas che lan ran par bcing //
analyzed: lhod bcings rma ni bad kan dang // rlung shas che lan ran par bcing //
translated: Loosely bound wounds are of phlegm and wind, tightly bound wounds are of bile.

original: ran zhing gnas su dam du bcing //
analyzed: ran zhing gnas su dam du bcing //
translated: Tightly bound wounds are bound firmly in their place.

original: dam zhing shin tu dam du bcing //
analyzed: dam zhing shin tu dam du bcing //
translated: Very tightly bound wounds are bound very firmly.

original: dgun dang de bzhin dpyid kyi tshe //
analyzed: dgun dang de bzhin dpyid kyi tshe //
translated: In winter and likewise in spring,

original: zhag ni gsum gsum dag nas dgrol //🔽khrag mkhris shas che'i rma dag ni //
analyzed: zhag ni gsum gsum dag nas dgrol // khrag mkhris shas che'i rma dag ni //
translated: they are untied every three days.

original: dam bcing gnas su ran par bcing //🔽ran bcing @104a * //
analyzed: dam bcing gnas su ran par bcing // ran bcing @104a * //
translated: Wounds of blood and bile are bound tightly and bound firmly in their place.

original: gnas su lhod par bcing //
analyzed: gnas su lhod par bcing //
translated: Tightly bound wounds are bound loosely in their place.

original: lhod bcing gnas su bcing mi bya //🔽de gnyis so ga ston gyi tshe //
analyzed: lhod bcing gnas su bcing mi bya // de gnyis so ga ston gyi tshe //
translated: Loosely bound wounds are not bound in their place.

original: snga dro phyi dro dgrol bar bya //
analyzed: snga dro phyi dro dgrol bar bya //
translated: Those two are untied in the morning and evening in summer and autumn.

original: ma bcings sha spang sbrang bu dang // lhags pa ser bu stsogs pas gnod //
analyzed: ma bcings sha spang sbrang bu dang // lhags pa ser bu stsogs pas gnod //
translated: Unbound wounds are harmed by flies, wind, and so forth.

original: rma red 'gyur zhes der snum dang // sman ni yun ring gnas mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rma red 'gyur zhes der snum dang // sman ni yun ring gnas mi 'gyur //
translated: Oil and medicine will not remain there for long.

original: sbyang ba'am 'tsho bar dka' ba dang // 'tshob kyang mdog ni mi sdug 'gyur //
analyzed: sbyang ba'am 'tsho bar dka' ba dang // 'tshob kyang mdog ni mi sdug 'gyur //
translated: If it is difficult to clean or live with, or if the color is unpleasant even when cleaned,

original: bcings na chag bcing phyi mar 'gyur //
analyzed: bcings na chag bcing phyi mar 'gyur //
translated: if it is bound, it will be bound again in the future.

original: 'phres sam 'bur gyur dral gyur tam //
analyzed: 'phres sam 'bur gyur dral gyur tam //
translated: If it is swollen, elevated, or cracked,

original: rtsa dang rgyus pa chad gyur kyang //
analyzed: rtsa dang rgyus pa chad gyur kyang //
translated: even if the veins and tendons are severed,

original: rma ni myur du bde bar 'tsho //🔽ldang dang nyal ba la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: rma ni myur du bde bar 'tsho // ldang dang nyal ba la sogs pa'i //
translated: the wound will heal quickly and well.

original: spyod lam kun la gnod pa med //
analyzed: spyod lam kun la gnod pa med //
translated: There is no harm in all activities such as standing, lying down, and so on.

original: rma kha skyes mtho mi mnyam dang / sra zhing rab na 'tsho ba dka' //
analyzed: rma kha skyes mtho mi mnyam dang / sra zhing rab na 'tsho ba dka' //
translated: If the wound is elevated, uneven, hard, or very painful,

original: 'jam zhing mnyam la na ba med //
analyzed: 'jam zhing mnyam la na ba med //
translated: if it is smooth, even, and without pain,

original: rma ni myur du dag cing 'tsho ba //
analyzed: rma ni myur du dag cing 'tsho ba //
translated: the wound will quickly heal and be cured.

original: rma ni yun ring sha chung dang / rtsub pas 'byor par ma gyur na //
analyzed: rma ni yun ring sha chung dang / rtsub pas 'byor par ma gyur na //
translated: If the wound is old, small, and rough, and not well-endowed,

original: nad gzhi dus tshigs ji bzhin du //
analyzed: nad gzhi dus tshigs ji bzhin du //
translated: according to the season and the condition,

original: sman dang lo mas dgab par bya //
analyzed: sman dang lo mas dgab par bya //
translated: it should be covered with medicine and leaves.

original: ma rnying gzhon zhing bu ga med //
analyzed: ma rnying gzhon zhing bu ga med //
translated: If it is not old, young, and without holes,

original: kun nas legs par khebs pa dang / phyis shing mi rtsub lo ma ni //🔽'o ma can shing stag pa dang / aa rdzu na dang ka damba'i //
analyzed: kun nas legs par khebs pa dang / phyis shing mi rtsub lo ma ni // 'o ma can shing stag pa dang / aa rdzu na dang ka damba'i //
translated: It should be well covered, not rough, and have leaves.

original: lo ma yis ni g-yogs par bya ;🔽/ mdze dang me yis tshig pa dang // 'bus zos gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra //
analyzed: lo ma yis ni g-yogs par bya ; / mdze dang me yis tshig pa dang // 'bus zos gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra //
translated: It should be covered with leaves of the milk tree, the tiger claw tree, and the kadamba tree.🔽One should not bind a wound that is caused by leprosy, fire,🔽eaten by worms, or has the color of urine or honey.

original: byi ba sbrul gyi dug dang ni //
analyzed: byi ba sbrul gyi dug dang ni //
translated: Nor one that is affected by the poison of rats or snakes,

original: thal sman rno dang dug gis pho //
analyzed: thal sman rno dang dug gis pho //
translated: or by sharp alkaline substances or poison.

original: rma ni bcing bar mi bya zhing //
analyzed: rma ni bcing bar mi bya zhing //
translated: One should not bind a wound that is swollen,

original: sha 'drul gzhang khar mi bzad rnags //🔽'drul zhing tsha dang na bcas par //
analyzed: sha 'drul gzhang khar mi bzad rnags // 'drul zhing tsha dang na bcas par //
translated: putrid, or has a foul smell in the anus.🔽One should not bind a wound that is oozing, hot, or painful,

original: skrangs skams med bal mi bcing ngo ;
analyzed: skrangs skams med bal mi bcing ngo ;
translated: without swelling or drying.

original: / rma gang legs par ma bsrungs par //
analyzed: / rma gang legs par ma bsrungs par //
translated: A wound that is not properly protected

original: sbrang ma srin bu 'jug byed de //
analyzed: sbrang ma srin bu 'jug byed de //
translated: will be invaded by flies and worms.

original: de yis zos pas na ba dang / skrang dang rang khrag 'dzag par byed //
analyzed: de yis zos pas na ba dang / skrang dang rang khrag 'dzag par byed //
translated: They will eat it, causing pain, swelling, and bleeding.

original: der ni bkru dang dag par ni //🔽bye'u rug la sogs sde tshan sbyar //
analyzed: der ni bkru dang dag par ni // bye'u rug la sogs sde tshan sbyar //
translated: There, one should apply🔽a group of medicines such as saptaparna,

original: sapta pa parni ka ranydza //
analyzed: sapta pa parni ka ranydza //
translated: and so forth.

original: aa rka dang ni nim pa dang // ra tsha dang ni shing tsha rnams //🔽ba gcin dang ni btags pa yi //
analyzed: aa rka dang ni nim pa dang // ra tsha dang ni shing tsha rnams // ba gcin dang ni btags pa yi //
translated: Arak, nimba, raksa, and shing tsha🔽are mixed with cow urine

original: lde gu de la bsku ba dang // thal sman chu ni blugs pas phan //
analyzed: lde gu de la bsku ba dang // thal sman chu ni blugs pas phan //
translated: and applied as an ointment.

original: yang na sha rlon gyis g-yogs la //
analyzed: yang na sha rlon gyis g-yogs la //
translated: Alternatively, cover it with raw meat

original: de ni myur du dbyung bar bya //
analyzed: de ni myur du dbyung bar bya //
translated: and quickly remove it.

original: 'di ni nang na skyon bcas pas //
analyzed: 'di ni nang na skyon bcas pas //
translated: This is an internal fault

original: myur du @104b 'tshob bar mi bya ste //
analyzed: myur du @104b 'tshob bar mi bya ste //
translated: that should not be quickly removed.

original: de ni gnod pa'ang chung dus kyang //
analyzed: de ni gnod pa'ang chung dus kyang //
translated: Even if it is a small injury,

original: slar zhing 'grams par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: slar zhing 'grams par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: it will later become a serious problem.🔽Even if it is removed, avoid indigestion,

original: 'tsho ba par gyur kyang ma zhu dang // drag shul bud med bsten stsogs spang //
analyzed: 'tsho ba par gyur kyang ma zhu dang // drag shul bud med bsten stsogs spang //
translated: excessive sexual activity, and so forth.

original: zla ba drug gam bdun gyi bar //
analyzed: zla ba drug gam bdun gyi bar //
translated: For six or seven months,

original: cho ga 'bad pas bsrung bar bya //
analyzed: cho ga 'bad pas bsrung bar bya //
translated: strenuously protect it with the ritual.

original: gnas skabs de dang der ni byung gyur tshe //
analyzed: gnas skabs de dang der ni byung gyur tshe //
translated: When it occurs in such and such a situation,

original: nad gzhi la stsogs stobs kyis rjes 'brangs te //
analyzed: nad gzhi la stsogs stobs kyis rjes 'brangs te //
translated: follow the strength of the illness and so forth.

original: phyi ma nas bshad rgya cher legs brtags la //
analyzed: phyi ma nas bshad rgya cher legs brtags la //
translated: Having thoroughly examined the extensive explanation in the later texts,

original: thabs ni de dang de yis 'bad de gso //
analyzed: thabs ni de dang de yis 'bad de gso //
translated: strive with this and that method to heal it.

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //
translated: The essence of the eight branches is summarized here.

original: mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o /
analyzed: mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o /
translated: This is the twenty-ninth chapter, on the topics of the sūtras.

original: // / de nas thal sman rnon po dang me btsa' gdab pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: // / de nas thal sman rnon po dang me btsa' gdab pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the chapter on the procedure of applying sharp medicinal pastes and moxibustion will be explained.

original: gtsags spyad lcags spyad rjes 'dra ba //
analyzed: gtsags spyad lcags spyad rjes 'dra ba //
translated: Like a needle or an iron probe,

original: mang po kun las thal sman mchog / dka' ba rnams su'ang bcad pa'am //
analyzed: mang po kun las thal sman mchog / dka' ba rnams su'ang bcad pa'am //
translated: the medicinal paste is supreme in all difficult cases.

original: dbug pa la stsogs byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: dbug pa la stsogs byed par 'gyur //
translated: It may be used for cutting, piercing, and so forth.

original: gtsags bus gdab par dka' ba la'ang //
analyzed: gtsags bus gdab par dka' ba la'ang //
translated: Even in difficult cases of pricking,🔽it is suitable to use it.

original: de yis bsgrub par rung ba dang // shin tu gso dka'i nad rnams la //
analyzed: de yis bsgrub par rung ba dang // shin tu gso dka'i nad rnams la //
translated: For very difficult-to-cure illnesses,

original: gang zhig btung du'ang rung ba yin //
analyzed: gang zhig btung du'ang rung ba yin //
translated: whatever is suitable to drink

original: de ni gzhang 'brum me drod nyams //🔽rde'u 'gags sbyar dug skran stsogs btung //🔽sme ba sha bkra sna 'thor dang // phyi rol gzhang 'brum tshor med mdze //
analyzed: de ni gzhang 'brum me drod nyams // rde'u 'gags sbyar dug skran stsogs btung // sme ba sha bkra sna 'thor dang // phyi rol gzhang 'brum tshor med mdze //
translated: is suitable for hemorrhoids, loss of digestive heat,🔽obstructed urine, toxic tumors, and so forth.🔽For moles, vitiligo, runny nose, external hemorrhoids, and numbness,

original: thor bu 'brum phran mtshan bar rngol //
analyzed: thor bu 'brum phran mtshan bar rngol //
translated: for single or multiple small boils, for itching between the genitals,

original: rma log stsogs la byug par bya //
analyzed: rma log stsogs la byug par bya //
translated: for wounds, and so forth, it should be applied as an ointment.

original: khrag mkhris rlung can nad stobs chung //
analyzed: khrag mkhris rlung can nad stobs chung //
translated: Blood, pitta and vata disorders of little strength,

original: rims dang tshad 'khru snying klad nad //
analyzed: rims dang tshad 'khru snying klad nad //
translated: fevers, hot disorders, diarrhea, heart and head disorders,

original: skya rbab yi ga 'chus pa dang // rab rib can la slon khrus btang //
analyzed: skya rbab yi ga 'chus pa dang // rab rib can la slon khrus btang //
translated: ascites, anorexia, and those with blurred vision should be given purgation.

original: lus kun khyab pa'i 'or nad dang // 'jigs dang sbrum ma zla mtshan 'dzag / pho mtshan mo mtshan skrangs pa dang // byis pa rgan po zas ma zhu //
analyzed: lus kun khyab pa'i 'or nad dang // 'jigs dang sbrum ma zla mtshan 'dzag / pho mtshan mo mtshan skrangs pa dang // byis pa rgan po zas ma zhu //
translated: For all-pervading swellings, fear, pregnant women with menstrual discharge, swelling of the male and female genitals, children, the elderly, indigestion,

original: rtsa bo che dang rus tshigs gnad //
analyzed: rtsa bo che dang rus tshigs gnad //
translated: large channels, bone joints,

original: rus pa gzhon nu chu ba rtsa //
analyzed: rus pa gzhon nu chu ba rtsa //
translated: young bones, channels,

original: lto bsrubs mgul pa lte ba dang // sha sra ba phyogs dang rlig pa dang // pho mtshan bu ga sen mo phrag / mig mchu ma gtogs mig nad rnams //
analyzed: lto bsrubs mgul pa lte ba dang // sha sra ba phyogs dang rlig pa dang // pho mtshan bu ga sen mo phrag / mig mchu ma gtogs mig nad rnams //
translated: the stomach, throat, navel, solid flesh, the sides, testicles, male organ, orifices, joints, and except for eye diseases,

original: tsha grang char dang yul rmus tshe //
analyzed: tsha grang char dang yul rmus tshe //
translated: when it is hot, cold, rainy, or dusty,

original: gnyi ga'ang gtang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga'ang gtang bar mi bya'o //
translated: both should not be given.🔽Mūlaka, black nightshade, mya ka,

original: mu ka ka nag sha mya ka / chu shing pa ri ba tra ka / aa shva ka rna 'dzam bu'i shing //
analyzed: mu ka ka nag sha mya ka / chu shing pa ri ba tra ka / aa shva ka rna 'dzam bu'i shing //
translated: plantain, paribhadraka, aśvakarṇa, jambu tree,

original: pal sha dang aa po ta //
analyzed: pal sha dang aa po ta //
translated: palasha, and apot.

original: aendra briksha aa rga dang // na gta ma la @105a * //
analyzed: aendra briksha aa rga dang // na gta ma la @105a * //
translated: And the Indian juniper.

original: mukti ka / sring shing aa pa marga dang // ka ka dza ka tsi tra ka //
analyzed: mukti ka / sring shing aa pa marga dang // ka ka dza ka tsi tra ka //
translated: The wood of the Indian rose-apple tree, the Indian walnut, the Indian oak, the Indian chestnut,

original: aagni manta til bca' sga //
analyzed: aagni manta til bca' sga //
translated: And the Indian ash.

original: rlon shing rtsa ba la stsogs bcas //
analyzed: rlon shing rtsa ba la stsogs bcas //
translated: The roots and so forth of the wet wood,🔽Cut into pieces,

original: dum bur yongs su gtubs pa dang // ko sha ta ka rnam bzhi dang // nas kyi sog ma gram rnams //
analyzed: dum bur yongs su gtubs pa dang // ko sha ta ka rnam bzhi dang // nas kyi sog ma gram rnams //
translated: And the four kinds of chaff, and the husks of barley,

original: rlung med gnas su bsags nas de //
analyzed: rlung med gnas su bsags nas de //
translated: In a place free from wind, they are collected.🔽On a flat stone, each is placed separately, and a heap of chaff,

original: rdo leb steng du so sor gzhag / mu ka ka yi phung po dang / rdo thal rdo ni bcug par bya //
analyzed: rdo leb steng du so sor gzhag / mu ka ka yi phung po dang / rdo thal rdo ni bcug par bya //
translated: And a stone is inserted.🔽Then, it is burned with a wick of sesamum oil. When the fire is extinguished,

original: de nas til gyi sdong bus bsreg / tshig nas me ni shi ba dang // rdo thal thal ba logs shig dbye //
analyzed: de nas til gyi sdong bus bsreg / tshig nas me ni shi ba dang // rdo thal thal ba logs shig dbye //
translated: The ashes of the stone are separated.

original: thal ba gzhan dag bre gang ste //
analyzed: thal ba gzhan dag bre gang ste //
translated: One prastha of the other ashes,

original: mu ka'i thal lhag blangs nas ni //🔽so sor phye ste chu dang gcin //
analyzed: mu ka'i thal lhag blangs nas ni // so sor phye ste chu dang gcin //
translated: Taking the remaining ashes of the chaff,🔽They are sifted, mixed with a thousand palas of water and bile,

original: srang stong dag dang bsres nas bzhu //
analyzed: srang stong dag dang bsres nas bzhu //
translated: And left to settle.

original: tshags ni bzang pos de btsags //

original: sna rtse legs par btag nas ni //
analyzed: sna rtse legs par btag nas ni //

analyzed: phyir la legs nyes rtogs bya ste //

analyzed: dbal bsad de nas mar bcas pa'i //

analyzed: gal te rtsa ba brtan gyur pas //

analyzed: thal sman gyis bsregs mi 'drul na // 'u su skyur snyigs shing mngar dang / til gyi lde gus de tshe bsku //

analyzed: til gyi lde gu shing mngar bcas //

original: dmar zhing na la g-ya' stsogs byed //
analyzed: dmar zhing na la g-ya' stsogs byed //

analyzed: gzhang khar bsregs drags khyad par du //

analyzed: gzhang kha 'byung bas 'chi bar 'gyur //

original: snar drags sna yi mtshul bar ni //
analyzed: snar drags sna yi mtshul bar ni //

original: nyams pa'am yang na yo ba'am //
analyzed: nyams pa'am yang na yo ba'am //

original: yul ni 'dzin mi nus par 'gyur //
analyzed: yul ni 'dzin mi nus par 'gyur //

original: rna ba stsogs pa'ang de dang 'dra //
analyzed: rna ba stsogs pa'ang de dang 'dra //

original: 'dir ni mchog tu skyur ba blugs //
analyzed: 'dir ni mchog tu skyur ba blugs //

original: shing mngar mar dang til btags byug rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba dang / bsil pa'i spyod pa thams cad phan //
analyzed: shing mngar mar dang til btags byug rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba dang / bsil pa'i spyod pa thams cad phan //
translated: Anoint with a paste of sweet flag, ghee, and sesame. It is beneficial to eliminate wind and bile, and all cooling conduct.

original: skur ba'i reg pa bsil bas na //
analyzed: skur ba'i reg pa bsil bas na //
translated: Because the cooling touch of the anointment

original: thal sman de dang 'dres gyur na //
analyzed: thal sman de dang 'dres gyur na //

analyzed: de yis myur du mngar gyur bas // skyur bas tsha ba shin tu 'jil //

original: me btsa' thal sman las mchog ste //
analyzed: me btsa' thal sman las mchog ste //

original: des bsregs pas ni slar mi 'byung //
analyzed: des bsregs pas ni slar mi 'byung //

original: sman dang thal sman mtshon spyad kyis //
analyzed: sman dang thal sman mtshon spyad kyis //

original: ma grub par yang grub byed yin //
analyzed: ma grub par yang grub byed yin //

analyzed: pags pa sha dang rtsa rgyus dang // tshigs dang rus stsogs de la gdab //
translated: Joints, bones, and so forth are pricked.🔽For moles, leprosy, head diseases,

original: sme ba mdze nad glad nad dang / mgo bo'i gzhogs phyed na stsogs la //
analyzed: sme ba mdze nad glad nad dang / mgo bo'i gzhogs phyed na stsogs la //
translated: And half-paralysis of the head,

original: pags bsregs ras bal ba lang so //🔽me shel mda' smyug stsogs me gdab //
analyzed: pags bsregs ras bal ba lang so // me shel mda' smyug stsogs me gdab //
translated: Burn the skin, cotton, and cow’s hair.🔽Use a fire glass, bamboo arrows, and so forth.

original: gzhang 'brum rmen bu mtshan bar rdol //🔽bu ga rma longs la stsogs la //
analyzed: gzhang 'brum rmen bu mtshan bar rdol // bu ga rma longs la stsogs la //
translated: For hemorrhoids, pustules, and bursting between the genitals,🔽For openings, wounds, and so forth,🔽Burn the flesh, beeswax, and butter,

analyzed: sha bsreg spra tshil mar bsregs dang // bu ram 'dzam bu'i chu yis bsreg / pags pa 'jar dang khrag ma chod //

original: thig le gnag stsogs pags nad na //
analyzed: thig le gnag stsogs pags nad na //

original: de dag nyid kyi rtsa bsreg go //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi rtsa bsreg go //

analyzed: bsreg min thal sman bkag pa dang // nang na mtshon lus rma chen 'byung //

original: khrag zags pa dang lto dral ba'o //
analyzed: khrag zags pa dang lto dral ba'o //

original: legs bsreg mar dag sbrang rtsis bsku //
analyzed: legs bsreg mar dag sbrang rtsis bsku //

original: snum dang bsil bas byug par bya //
analyzed: snum dang bsil bas byug par bya //

original: legs pa'i mtshan ma khrag mi dbyung //
analyzed: legs pa'i mtshan ma khrag mi dbyung //

original: sgra can chu bur phre'u 'byung //
analyzed: sgra can chu bur phre'u 'byung //
translated: In the case of a sound, blisters and pustules occur.

original: ta la'i 'bras smin thi ba 'dra //
analyzed: ta la'i 'bras smin thi ba 'dra //

original: na ba chung zhing 'tshob pa sla ;
analyzed: na ba chung zhing 'tshob pa sla ;

original: / bag med pas bsregs thams cad dang / bsregs nyes bsregs ni drags pa dang // ma tshos mtshan nyid dang bcas bzhi //
analyzed: / bag med pas bsregs thams cad dang / bsregs nyes bsregs ni drags pa dang // ma tshos mtshan nyid dang bcas bzhi //
translated: All those burned by carelessness, those burned improperly, those burned excessively, and those not burned, have four characteristics.

original: ma tshos pags mdog mi sdug tsha //
analyzed: ma tshos pags mdog mi sdug tsha //

analyzed: chu bur 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // bsregs nyes chu bur che rab tsha //

analyzed: bsregs drags pas ni sha @106b 'phyang dang // pags pa 'khums shing rab tu tsha //

original: dud pa 'khyims pa lta bu dang // rtsa stsogs 'khums shing skom dang brgyal //
analyzed: dud pa 'khyims pa lta bu dang // rtsa stsogs 'khums shing skom dang brgyal //

analyzed: rma yi gting zab 'chi bar 'gyur // mtshos pa ni me phrad cing //

analyzed: tsha ba'i sman ni gtang bar bya //

original: khrag ska shin tu na bar 'gyur /
analyzed: khrag ska shin tu na bar 'gyur /

analyzed: zags par gyur na nad tshabs chung //

original: bsregs nyes bsil dang dro ba'i sman //
analyzed: bsregs nyes bsil dang dro ba'i sman //

original: dang por btang na de 'og bsil //
analyzed: dang por btang na de 'og bsil //

analyzed: bsregs legs na ni cu gang dang // plag sha tsandan btsag yug snam //

analyzed: sle tres bcas pa mngar bcas bsku //

analyzed: de 'og mkhris me dbal ltar spyad //

analyzed: bsregs drag mkhris pa me dbal gyi //
translated: For severe burns, all the pitta-fire

analyzed: cho ga thams cad myur du spyad //

analyzed: snum gyis shin tu bsregs drags pa //

analyzed: der ni rtsub pa'i cho ga'ang bya //

analyzed: snying po gsang ba lta bu ni //

analyzed: gnas 'dir rdzogs par bya pa yin //

analyzed: 'dir don phra ba mdor bshad kyi //

analyzed: mdo'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu tham pa'o /

analyzed: khu khrag skyon med par sems can //

original: rang las nyon mongs kyis bskul nas //
analyzed: rang las nyon mongs kyis bskul nas //

analyzed: tshogs pas mngal chags 'gyur te //

analyzed: thal ba sru sru'i rtsa bas phan //
